items.title: Huge anti-government protests in Tehran and other Iranian cities, videos show
items.description: Rallies on major roads in the capital and in Iran's second city were peaceful and not dispersed by security forces.

items.title: Two starkly opposed Americas laid bare by deadly ICE shooting
items.description: The incident is threatening to inflame a deeply contentious debate over immigration enforcement.

items.title: Bowen: Trump risks pushing world back to age of empires
items.description: Donald Trump wants and needs quick victories. Taking Maduro is the decisive win he has craved, writes Jeremy Bowen.

items.title: One million spent hours without heat and water after Russian strikes, Ukraine says
items.description: Efforts are continuing to restore services in Dnipropetrovsk, officials say, after wide-spread attacks in the southeast.

items.title: Algeria apologises after player mocks Congolese superfan dressed as pan-African hero
items.description: Michel Nkuka Mboladinga stood motionless throughout DR Congo's Afcon matches in tribute to Patrice Lumumba.
